Class EntityHurtMixin

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.entity.Entity
io.github.zhengzhengyiyi.tweak_api.mixin.EntityHurtMixin
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.fabricmc.fabric.api.attachment.v1.AttachmentTarget, net.minecraft.component.ComponentsAccess, net.minecraft.entity.data.DataTracked, net.minecraft.scoreboard.ScoreHolder, net.minecraft.util.Nameable, net.minecraft.world.entity.EntityLike, net.minecraft.world.entity.UniquelyIdentifiable
public abstract class EntityHurtMixin extends net.minecraft.entity.Entity
Mixin for LivingEntity to inject into the damage calculation process.
